price: Ntumwa y’Imana! Warungikanwe Qor’ani, kugira ugabishe ku bihano vy’Imana Allah, abantu ba se babo batagabishijwe igihe kirekire, baraheza rero baragotwa ntibemera[2];
arabic: لِتُنذِرَ قَوۡمٗا مَّآ أُنذِرَ ءَابَآؤُهُمۡ فَهُمۡ غَٰفِلُونَ
footnotes: [2] Iyi Aayah, ihimiriza abamenyi mw’idini, ko bategerezwa kwama bibutsa abantu, kugira ntibagotwe ku mabwirizwa y’Imana Allah.

meta.transliteration: litundhira qawman mā undhira ābāuhum fahum ghāfilūna
